block.p: FIELD-R. Henry, 92. On August 14, 2000 at King St. Nursing Home, Greenwich, CT. Originally from Providence, RI. In loving memory. Survived by loving wife, Nan, son Gregory, daughter Alexandra, stepchildren Malcolm Starr, Cynthia Starr, Elliot Goss, Dana Avison and numerous grandchildren. Served as Secretary at Gorham Manufacturing Company, investment counselor, as well as Rhode Island State Purchasing Agent. In addition, participated in numerous community and civic activities in various significant capacities. Retired from US Navy with rank of Lieutenant Commander and awarded Bronze Star Medal and two battle stars in relation to Iwo Jima and Okinawa campaigns. Memorial service is at the Zion Episcopal Church, 3PM, Saturday, August 19, Manchester, VT. In lieu of flowers donations may be made to Williams College.
